inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis diagnosed by either of the following in a patient with chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: (a) Liver Biopsy (b) Radiologic evidence of varices, cirrhosis or portal hypertension
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: (c) Laboratory evidence of platelet count <100,000 or AST/ALT ratio>1
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: (d) Endoscopic evidence of varices or portal gastropathy
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: At least two HE episodes, one within the last year but not within the last month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to give written, informed consent (mini-mental status exam>25 at the time of consenting)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: (3) TIPS, non-elective hospitalization or HE within last month
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: (5) known untreated, in-situ luminal GI cancers
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CLL and large cell transformation with Richter's transformation. He has had multiple treatments including FCR, PCR, R-CVP, and Campath therapy.
